Event.name: L1 I-Cache access
Event.Description: The counter counts instruction memory access that access at least the Level 1 instruction or unified cache. Each access to other level 1 instruction memory structures, such as refill buffers, is also counted.

Event.name: Data memory access
Event.Description: This counter counts memory-read or memory-write operations that the processor made. The counter increments whether the access results in an access to a Level1 data or unified cache, a Level2 data or unified cache, or neither of these.
